derivation: from an unused root meaning to shade;
outline:
1. image
    1. images (of tumours, mice, heathen gods)
    2. image, likeness (of resemblance)
    3. mere, empty, image, semblance (fig.)
strongs_def: a phantom, i.e. (figuratively) illusion, resemblance; hence, a representative figure, especially an idol
